Workflow Instance.name: ImpactTv1betaAdios
Workflow Instance.description: This is a sample workflow. The driver application is xmain, and the downstream analysis application is reader2.

Workflow Component.name: xmain_0
Workflow Component.description: This is a component of the workflow. This names the directory of profiles to be parsed for one execution of one application.

Workflow Component.name: reader2_0
Workflow Component.description: This is a component of the workflow. This names the directory of profiles to be parsed for one execution of one application.

Workflow Component-input.name: ImpactT.in
Workflow Component-input.desctiption: This is the input to the main driver application.

Workflow Component-input.name: start00001.bp
Workflow Component-input.description: This is the ADIOS input to the analysis application.

Workflow Component-output.name: start00001.bp
Workflow Component-output.desctiption: This is the ADIOS output from the main driver application.

Metric.description: This is a metric used to measure the applications.

Location.description: This is where the application was executed.

Workflow metadata.Dependency Graph description: This is the workflow dependency graph. Each workflow component has a list of workflow components that it depends on. In this case, xmain_0 has no dependencies, and reader2_0 has a dependency on xmain_0.
